lines.text: You mean you'd take another body, and with this body you'd make love to me?
You bet I would! I mean... if it's possible.
I don't know, Scott. That's kinky stuff. We've never been kinky.
I'm your girl all right. But you're not my man, you're my ghost!
Be assured, Mrs. Scott, that in this room there are knives sharp enough to cut you to the bone and hearts cold enough to eat yours as hors-d'oeuvres.
You're too pretty to be bad!
My dead husband wants to possess your body.
There's no way out of eternity. You're stuck with it.
